name: Greenpark Capital
overview:
Greenpark Capital is a well established global leader in customised secondaries solutions. We help clients fine-tune their exposure to private equity funds by exiting or part-exiting investments prior to maturity.

Our guiding principle is that every client and every transaction is different. We take a flexible approach that delivers tailor-made solutions, to help our client maximise returns, however diverse their portfolio.

Our multi-cultural, multi-lingual investment team has a reputation for excellence that spans every size and type of transaction. We specialise in developing strategies to meet our clientsâ€™ objectives, from portfolio rebalancing through to freeing up capital and anything in between.

With over â‚¬1.3 billion ($1.8bn) of capital under management across three funds, we are capitalised by major institutions including banks, pension funds and insurance companies from Europe, the US, Asia and the Middle East.
